DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate efficacy safety contrast drug pediatric renal ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Contrast Enhanced Ultrasound Evaluation Reflux Nephropathy
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Age equal 8 year Patient history urinary tract infection ( UTI ) history Voiding Cystourethrogram ( VCUG ) vesicoureteral reflux Candidate Dimercaptosuccinic acid ( DMSA ) scan scan renal scar Demonstration renal scarring DMSA scan renal ultrasound without contrast Includes healthy volunteer Age less 8years Allergy contrast related product Cardiac shunt/ congenital heart anomaly Abnormal baseline ECG Open heart surgery Evidence retinopathy Patient intensive care Unable comply study requirement History emphysema Unable maintain oxygen saturation 92 % room air Pregnancy lactation
